function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for drop off and delivery space due to online shopping and home food delivery","Impact":"Competition for curb space and potential congestion","Mitigation":"Implement dedicated drop off and delivery zones, and re-purpose curbside street parking","Technologies":"Smart parking systems, delivery tracking technology","People":"Pedestrians, delivery drivers, online shoppers","Owner":"Municipalities, delivery companies"},{"Description":"Controversial nature of street redesigns and political challenges","Impact":"Delay in implementing necessary changes to street design","Mitigation":"Engage in public consultations, provide clear communication, and involve community representatives in the decision-making process","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, virtual consultation tools","People":"Local residents, community representatives, urban planners","Owner":"Local governments, urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about mainstreaming health criteria into public space design","Impact":"Slow adoption of health criteria in public space design","Mitigation":"Publish guidelines and best practices for integrating health criteria, and provide training for urban planners and designers","Technologies":"Online training platforms, digital design tools","People":"Urban planners, designers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, urban planning associations"}]}
